passives.name: Spoils of War
passives.effects: Grants a charge every 45 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below 50% of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

passives.name: Quest
passives.effects: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Bulwark of the Mountain, increasing the Warding active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

active.name: Warding
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area. Holds up to 3 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.
